Reviews.Title: “Everything you need”
Reviews.Author: amar k Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: friends stayed hotel 2 nights stag 4 quad easily accommodated clean bathroom clean hotel excellent location walking distance short cab tram ride dam square highly recommend hotel value money

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: Von7_11
Reviews.Content: chose hotel location near musuems easy walking vondel park city centrethe hotel clean basic staff friendly beds comfortable nice didnt breakfast coffee shops nearby bagel shop value hard beat

Reviews.Title: “im staying here for 2 months”
Reviews.Author: hsrajoe
Reviews.Content: parents enjoyed alot excelent location amazingly helpfull staff specialy nick helped reservations clubs restraunts museums tours im staying read reviews im stying 15 garden floor yes windows decorated own shower toilet flat screen tv star hotel hell alot hotels ive seen city am writing truely feel bad hotel people running bad reviews lad birds december people didnt stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not bad”
Reviews.Author: mollymak
Reviews.Content: returned 2 day stay hotel bad clean tidy decor modern looks doing bit bit paid id defiantly recommend ideal location short walk short tram dam centre didnt breakfast hotel helpful reception allowing 4 party 8 check freshen return happy hotel location staff

Reviews.Title: “We had a great time!!!”
Reviews.Author: Idan M
Reviews.Content: okay quad compare 3 stars hotels staying amsterdam staff pretty amazing clean location oh location 2 min walk parties bars coffeeshops 7 min tram dam square

Reviews.Title: “Great Pictures - Terrible Rooms! Grubby Bathrooms!”
Reviews.Author: Dhlix
Reviews.Content: dont fooled pictures hotel foyer thats booked double smelt damp single bedsa pushed reception request changed shown double bed single quilts amount quilt window propped wooden block cold smelt damp avoid definitely worth money paid warned ps nice lady reception location

Reviews.Title: “Shabby”
Reviews.Author: turnfish
Reviews.Content: stayed 46 october website excellent impression hotel reality somewhat pleasant reception staircase leading hostel style corridors walls grubby looked tatty bathroom described basic significant noise night resolved id managed hold night porter 0400 15 mins calling reception

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel ever but most expensive.......rip off......”
Reviews.Author: ema340x
Reviews.Content: partner stayed 239 259 2011 2 nights hotel website looks fab couldnt wait arrive settled hotel lobby lovely chandelier loud hotel cellar bathroom dark dull miserable windows outside path level paid 2 nights recommend hotel worst enemy location greatjust 5 mins walk town 5mins walk dam frank museum emotional worth money

Reviews.Title: “what you pay is what you get”
Reviews.Author: emy77emy
Reviews.Content: weve spent 4 days location quiet 1 tram station leidseplein 5 centraal station supermarket nearby 5 min walk leidseplein 10 min walk shopping 1520 dam square 25 rld 10 min heineken experience 4 beds ground floor accesibility inner garden spacious bathtube shower bathroom plasma screen breakfast normal start day staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “i have been in hostels better”
Reviews.Author: Nic_85_26
Reviews.Content: check slow dont system slow staff website reception misleading looks plush lift reach floor 207 2 single beds fine child size beds 1 towel provided building 8am dont

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: -Miki-001
Reviews.Content: reception friendly staff english spoken dutch check time extended 1200 extra cost elevator 3rd floor spacious furniture basic beds comfortable towel guest supplied bathroom shower curtain short water ran bathroom wet feet guaranteed orientation close museumplein en leidsplein connected public transportation

Reviews.Title: “Could really do better!”
Reviews.Author: Jasperco
Reviews.Content: hotel wellsituated travellers amsterdam tram bus routes close consists couple refurbished houses decor modern welcome friendly staff told breakfast city taxes included rate paid waiting till checkout annoying fairly sparsely furnished bathshower toliets modern clean thin towel provided guest reading light simply dim ceiling breakfast continental type marred toast bread cold boiled eggs little attention detail improve friendly

Reviews.Title: “Basic but pleasant”
Reviews.Author: smittieswife
Reviews.Content: reception impression dont live standard basic frills looking comfortable sleep bathroom cleaner shower pipe burst replaced morning prompt service noise night guests yelling didnt looking base head sightseeing bad book

Reviews.Title: “Charming place to stay in!”
Reviews.Author: Olgakazak
Reviews.Content: fell love amsterdam short trip 2730 helpful staff nice polite brought additional blankets heating cold advised perfect restaurant dinner hotel perfectly located near vondelpark museums leidesplein easily walk city attractions am totally fascinated amsterdam truly hotel impression looking forward coming cosy

Reviews.Title: “Definately not Bliss!!”
Reviews.Author: sickofnosun
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel stranded amsterdam due volcano price deluxe 95 euro basic leaking basin cracked tiles toileteries except shower soap definately deluxe standard following night price increased 150 euro real rip location fine nearby shops bars park surprised hotel 3 stars

Reviews.Title: “really really bad!”
Reviews.Author: chemicalbrothers
Reviews.Content: service bad reception night service mentionned terrible situated basement poorly isolated noisy clean toilet leaking refused change didnt offer reduction paid 90 euros family hotel business managed abroad run underpaid asian staff recommand hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great for a short trip”
Reviews.Author: Dirk_18
Reviews.Content: stayed person visiting amsterdam friends booked fairly late wasnt expecting especially read trip advisor review pleasantly surprised clean standard 4 bed massive comfy beds location bars restaurants tram stops definitely recommend hotel comfy clean hotel short stay amsterdam

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Blyss
HotelInfo.Address: Vondelstraat 74-78, Amsterdam 1054 GN, The Netherlands
